name: Extension-DCH-HouseholdMember-1
description: This extension has been constrained to represent the household member information for a person related to the patient, to support the Digital Child Health project.

element.short: The household member information for a person related to the Patient
element.definition: The household member information for a person related to the Patient

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: xml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
element.comment: Note that FHIR strings may not exceed 1MB in size

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.short: Additional Content defined by implementations
element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element.
